Interface ec.e.inspect.InspectorUI

public interface InspectorUI
extends Object
The interface InspectorUI defines all the operations that an inspector user interface must implement. We currently define an IFC-based UI and expect currently only to create a text-based UI beyond that.

inspectObject(Object, String)

inspectObject 
  public abstract void inspectObject(Object iobj,
                                     String name)
